body_html: Templating matmult on a semiring (similar to composition and others in OpenFst) might be too big of a change. But maybe one could just add a few new matrix multiplication functions for particular popular semirings, e.g., matmult_log, matmult_maxplus, etc.
body_text: Templating matmult on a semiring (similar to composition and others in OpenFst) might be too big of a change. But maybe one could just add a few new matrix multiplication functions for particular popular semirings, e.g., matmult_log, matmult_maxplus, etc.
body: Templating `matmult` on a semiring (similar to composition and others in OpenFst) might be too big of a change. But maybe one could just add a few new matrix multiplication functions for particular popular semirings, e.g., `matmult_log`, `matmult_maxplus`, etc.
